title: Chrono Crusade, Vol. 8
description: Pandaemonium is dying... and with her passing, the earth is faced with the greatest threat ever, as Aion's age-old vendetta nears fruition... Only Rosette and Chrno stand between him and the world's annihilation! However, the odds are heavily stacked against them, for, the duo is up against the toughest enemy of all - time. Although the Apostles turn around and aid the two crusaders, it might be too late. Whatever the result of this conflict, one thing is guaranteed: There will be no winners, only survivors. And so, the roller coaster tale of a headstrong nun and her gallant demon companion comes to a bitter, tragic - yet strangely soothing - conclusion...
author: Daisuke Moriyama
